turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about The Rachel Maddow Show.
turn.1: What is The Rachel Maddow Show?
turn.2: The Rachel Maddow Show The Rachel Maddow Show (also abbreviated TRMS) is a daily news and opinion television program that airs on MSNBC, running in the 9:00 pm ET timeslot Monday through Friday.
turn.4: It is hosted by Rachel Maddow, who gained a public profile via her frequent appearances as a progressive pundit on programs aired by MSNBC.
turn.5: Is the show based on anything?
turn.6: It is based on her former radio show of the same name.
turn.9: Who are some of the guests that have appeared on the show?
turn.10: Keith Olbermann, then host of MSNBC's "Countdown with Keith Olbermann", was Maddow's first guest on her debut show, and has been given credit for pushing for Maddow to gain her own show.
turn.11: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.12: Prior to getting her own show, Maddow had served as regular guest host for "Countdown" when Olbermann was absent. " The Rachel Maddow Show" replaced "Verdict with Dan Abrams". "The Rachel Maddow Show" is broadcast from Studio 3-A at the NBC Studios, 30 Rockefeller Plaza in New York.
